Grammar:   DataElement 6.0
Namespace: shr.test
Uses:      shr.core

CodeSystem:     FOO = http://foo.org

Entry:          SystemlessCodeConstraintOnValue
Description:    "It is an entry with a system-less code constraint on the value"
Property:       CodedFromValueSet
Value:          concept = #bar

Element:        CodedFromValueSet
Value:          concept from http://standardhealthrecord.org/test/vs/Coded (required)
